snippet: The newspaper company said it would pay $280 million for the Journal Media Group.
abstract: Gannett says it will buy Journal Media Group, publisher of The Milwaukee Journal Sentinel and 14 other daily newspapers, for $280 million.
lead_paragraph: The newspaper company said it would pay $280 million for the Journal Media Group.

headline.main: Gannett in Deal for Milwaukee Journal Sentinel
headline.print_headline: Gannett in Deal for Milwaukee Journal Sentinel
